meanings.definition: Operating or able to operate with limited functionality.
meanings.sent1: The old computer was semifunctional, only able to browse simple websites.
meanings.sent2: The toy robot was semifunctional, moving its arms but unable to walk.
meanings.sent3: The semifunctional toaster only toasted one side of the bread, making breakfast a bit lopsided.
meanings.sent4: Her semifunctional phone was like a car with only one working wheel, struggling to keep up with modern devices.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight was semifunctional, flickering on and off unpredictably in the dark.

meanings.definition: Capable of performing some functions but not fully operational.
meanings.sent1: The old printer was semifunctional, printing only in black and white.
meanings.sent2: The semi truck was semifunctional, able to drive short distances but not for long hauls.
meanings.sent3: The semifunctional clock chimed at random hours, confusing everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: His semifunctional memory was like a leaky bucket, retaining some information but losing most.
meanings.sent5: The semifunctional car sputtered to life, struggling to reach high speeds on the highway.
